amendment.description: To provide for equal liability treatment of vehicle fuels and fuel additives.

vote.text: Amendment SA 856 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 57. Record Vote Number: 208.

action.text: Amendment SA 856 proposed by Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 850. (consideration: CR S7423-7430, S7443-7444; text: CR S7424) To provide for equal liability treatment of vehicle fuels and fuel additives.
